response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special price of $11,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $12,000, aiming to provide you with an exceptional opportunity. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 11000}
